00188 #define RKH_CREATE_COMP_STATE( name,id,en,ex,parent,defchild,history )  \
00189                                                                         \
00190                                 extern rkhrom RKHTR_T name##_trtbl[];   \
00191                                                                         \
00192                                 rkhrom RKHSREG_T name =                 \
00193                                 {                                       \
00194                                     mkbase(RKH_COMPOSITE,id,name),      \
00195                                     mkcomp(en,ex,parent,name,           \
00196                                                 defchild,history)       \
00197                                 }

00310 #define RKH_CREATE_DEEP_HISTORY_STATE( name,id,parent )                 \
00311                                                                         \
00312                                 static rkhrom RKHSREG_T *ram##name;     \
00313                                                                         \
00314                                 rkhrom RKHSHIST_T name =                \
00315                                 {                                       \

00317                                     parent,&ram##name                   \
00318                                 }
